synopsis.text: Inui Juuzou, a former soldier turned cyborg with a gun for a head, navigates a post-war world filled with individuals similarly transformed into deadly weapons, known as the Extended. With no recollection of his past, Inui ekes out a living as a Resolver, tackling cases involving his fellow Extended. When a mysterious child with ties to the Extended ends up in his office, Inui finds himself entangled in a dangerous web of street gangs and the powerful Ber√ºhren corporation. As he strives to protect the child, Inui must confront his past and unravel the mysteries surrounding the Extended. In a city where everyone seems to be after the child, Inui's loyalty to his fellow Extended may be the only thing standing between the child and those who seek to harm him. Join Inui in "No Guns Life" as he delves deeper into a world of intrigue, danger, and the complex realities of being an Extended.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
